name: 100! Puzzle Tentris
description:
A new challenge for block puzzle lovers! Let’s play 100 Puzzle Tentris!
The object of Tentris is to last as long as possible before the 10x10 board fills up with blocks. Try to score 10,000 if you can!

• Simple and super fun gameplay that you can enjoy anywhere, anytime
• Friendly app that won’t drain your battery
• 15+ special themes to make your experience even more exciting!

The puzzle is guaranteed to feed your mind and entertain like never before. It is a great way to balance between relaxation and challenges.
Can you beat your own top score and the scores of your friends?

We’re waiting to see who’s the Champion of this block puzzle world ^_^

~ The 100 Puzzle Tentris Team ~
